actions.recommendation: Flushing erythematous, pruritic rash on both arms - took Niacin before the medical (usually happens when she takes it) Possible small umbilical hernia - very soft cough reflex palpated, review with possible abdominal wall sonar. Discuss with GP.
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram

Decrease red meat use, decrease alcohol use significantly, increase the amount of fresh veggies that you eat. Limiting alcohol will also be helpful in improving sleep quality and decreasing inflammation levels.
